Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
cha-cha \cha-cha\ n. a modern ballroom dance from Latin America; it uses two slow steps followed by three quick small steps, with swaying movements of the hips, and has many variations of movements based on that rhythm.
Syn: cha-cha. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
cha-cha n : a modern ballroom dance from Latin America; small steps and swaying movements of the hips [syn: {cha-cha-cha}]
